text: Ashburys railway station in Openshaw serves Beswick and West Gorton in Manchester, England. It is located on the Manchester-Glossop Line at its junction with the branch line to and and the freight-only line to Phillips Park Junction (on the Huddersfield Line). == Other websites == Category:Railway stations in Manchester Category:1855 establishments in Europe Category:1850s establishments in England
title: Ashburys railway station
